alert.note: Alert for Deuel (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 12:20AM CDT until June 06 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Deuel County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until midnight MDT. * At 1119 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lodgepole, or 12 miles west of Chappell, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chappell. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 78 and 95. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
